text:
Manage Odell Beckham featured in Richard Sherman's jersey collection Seattle Seahawks CB Richard Sherman has a lot of respect for New York Giants WR Odell Beckham Jr. Slot to New York Giants Newsletter Newsletter 
Some might say Odell Beckham Jr. truly solidified himself as one of the NFL's best young wide receivers during his rookie season when he matched up against Richard Sherman in just his fifth career game. 
The New York Giants ' first-round pick was matched up for most of the game on the right side of the formation -- lined up across from him was the Seattle Seahawks' star cornerback. Beckham finished with seven receptions for 108 yards on nine targets that day. 
On Sunday, Sherman showed off his respect for Beckham when he posted a picture on Instagram of all the jerseys he's collected from players over the course of his career. Players like Dez Bryant , Tom Brady , Antonio Brown , Calvin Johnson and Charles Woodson were all on display. Looking through the closet .... quite the collection... A post shared by Richard Sherman (@rsherman25) on Feb 25, 2017 at 11:46am PST 
The message Beckham wrote to Sherman, if anything at all, could, unfortunately, be blocked in the image above. The two players have only matched up against each other once in their careers, so it makes it even more meaningful that Sherman decided to include Beckham in his collection. 
On the field, Beckham still has the upper hand, at least for now. Author
